name: Iron Choices: Rell's Story
description:
A short visual novel exploring, from her perspective, Rell's traumatic childhood and validating her experiences and sexual identity as an emerging adult.

Winner of Best Self Expression Project  @  PrideMakers 2021

This game was a submission for PrideMakers 2021 Team Liquid hackathon by:

Sarah Kangastone @bellbellum#6581

Seaney Shell @Moth#1574

Dorina Melegh @niaghtmare#1634

Writing/Creative Direction : Sarah Kangastone
Art : Sarah Kangastone
Programming : Seaney Shell
Feedback  : Dorina Melegh


Used resources & licensing
Song title: 2017 World Championship Theme Artist: League of Legends. Arranged by Gerard K. Marino. Performed by Hollywood Chamber Orchestra at the 2017 World Championship, Beijing, China.

All other Sound effects are all from league of legends and are owned by Riot Games, Inc.

Courtesy of Riot Games https://www.riotgames.com/en/legal
